body:
> because location result is not instantaneous

Both platforms can report the last know location and the latency is low. We can always return nil if there is no known last known location. But the users will likely to be polling the notifier anyways in a separate goroutine not to block the main. That's why I agree that we should go async.

On the other hand, I'm not really sure about a channel based API. Because you want to consume the last known location again and again.
